a: Catamyst is a career development platform to help you learn and practice professional skills in the software industry.

q: How is Catamyst different than coding bootcamp?
a: Learning in Catamyst doesn't have any time limit and ties to a specific location. You learn at your own pace.

q: Do I have to know how to code before joining Catamyst?
a: No, you are open to join regardless your background and experience.
